Swordsman------------------------use "Warrior" animations

Axeman -----------------------------use "Warrior" animations

Maceman---------------------------use "Praetorian" animations

Spearman--------------------------use "GreekPhalanx" animations

Pikeman----------------------------use "GreekPhalanx" animations

Archer--------------------------------use "Archer" animations

Longbowman---------------------use "Longbowman" animations

Crossbowman-------------------use "Crossbowman" animations

Chariot------------------------------use "Chariot_Celtic" animations

Horseman-------------------------In Game (NUMIDIAN_CAVALRY)

Knight-------------------------------use "Companion_Cavalry" animations
